name: Orichalcos Kyutora
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by paying 500 LP. While this card is face-up on the field, all battle damage you would take from battles involving monsters you control becomes 0. When this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Orichalcos Shunoros" from your hand or Deck.
